reviews.review_msg: I'm surprised that Lawrence Boland is still teaching.  I attended his Econ 305 course back in 1986.  Changed my life.  He was engaging and spent the time to challenge the students if you were up to the challenge.  Never looked back.  I should drop in an visit him if he is still around.
One of the best professors I ever had.

He is my top 3 professor in economic department. I used to think 3 hours class would be really boring, but, not at all, his class is really interest. Also, 3hours class had been passed really fast. However, asking questions that you donot understand marterial Between, He is a nicest and most intelligence professor at the Economic deparment.
